card.name: CW - Cannot create users - Attorney front end

data.text:
So attorney frontend wont be fixed at present, we will need to wait for new version, is that correct? @cobuspienaar @yasserogier @stefanbar @shaunviljoen 
Shaun will then still need to create users as per usual? Comments below also suggested it be looked at and fixed before new version release. Please advise.
